Class RootClass

java.lang.Object
  resources.RootClass
Direct Known Subclasses:
AsyncJobTest, Cart, CartDecoder, Coord, JobRef, jobStack, JobTreePath, JsonKeyFinder, NameSpaceDefinition, NodeBase, NodeCookie, NodeMap, PositionParser, TapAccess, TapNode, TapNodeTest, UserSession, XmlToJson, XmlToJsonTest, ZipEntryRef, ZipMap, ZIPUtil
public class RootClass
extends Object

Super class of he project Contains constants and regexp used by the project and some methods managing working directories
